data.eml:eml: The genus Phlesirtes Bolivar, 1922 (Orthoptera: Tettigoniidae: Conocephalinae, Conocephalini, Karniellina), a review of the genus with data on its bioacoustics and the description of new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hemp, Claudia, Heller, Klaus-Gerhard (2017): The genus Phlesirtes Bolivar, 1922 (Orthoptera: Tettigoniidae: Conocephalinae, Conocephalini, Karniellina), a review of the genus with data on its bioacoustics and the description of new species. Zootaxa 4244 (4): 451-477, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4244.4.1
